title: PLACES: Local Data for Better Health
description: This dataset contains four levels (county, census tract, ZCTA, place) social determinants of health (SDOH) measures from the American Community Survey 5-year data for the entire United States—50 states and the District of Columbia.  Data were downloaded from data.census.gov using Census API and processed by the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), Division of Population Health, Epidemiology and Surveillance Branch. These measures complement existing PLACES measures, including PLACES SDOH measures (e.g., health insurance, routine check-up). These data can be used together with PLACES data to identify which health and SDOH issues overlap in a community to help inform public health planning.
creator: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention and Health Promotion Division of Population Health
publisher: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
provider: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention National Center for Chronic Disease Prevention and Health Promotion Division of Population Health
spatial_resolution_note: This data includes multiple spatial resolution
methods_variables: 'Crowding among housing units', 'Persons living below 150% of the poverty level', 'No high school diploma among adults aged 25 years or older', 'Persons of racial or ethic minority status', 'Persons aged 65 years or older', 'Housing cost burden among households', 'Unemployment among people 16 years and older in the labot force', 'No broadband internet subscription among households'
